definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: evenness, uprightness, equity;—only pl.: [[מֵשָׁרִים]] Pr 1:3; elsewhere [[מֵישָׁרִים]] Is 26:7 + 17 t.;—
evenness, level Is 26:7, of path of righteous (in the future), fig. for free from difficulties; smoothness, of the flow of wine, ´[[בְּמ]] Pr 23:31; ´[[למ]] Ct So 7:10.

in ethical sense, uprightness, equity, as taught in the school of wisdom Pr 8:6, ‖[[חֶדֶק]] Pr 1:3, Pr 2:9; of government ´[[מ]]([[ב]]) Ps 9:9, Ps 58:2, Ps 75:3, Ps 96:10, Ps 99:4; of speech Is 33:15, Pr 23:16; of Yahweh's promises Is 45:19; ´[[רחה מ]] 1Ch 29:17 have pleasure in equity; ´[[עשׂה מ]] Da 11:6 make an equitable arrangement.
adv. rightly, with [[חזה]] Ps 17:2; [[אהב]] Ct So 1:4.
